# videoAutoplayStatusDidChangeNotification

**Type Property**

A notification that UIKit posts when the system’s Auto-Play Video Previews setting changes.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated static let videoAutoplayStatusDidChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
```

## Autoplay videos

- **isVideoAutoplayEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the Auto-Play Video Previews setting is in an enabled state.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the Auto-Play Video Previews setting is in an enabled state.
items.name: isVideoAutoplayEnabled

title: videoAutoplayStatusDidChangeNotification
